Resistance.help: You are naturally resistant to smashing and lethal damage.
Resistance.targetHelp: You are naturally resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Power_Blast.help: You launch a more powerful blast of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back.
Power_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Power_Bolt.help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down.
Power_Bolt.shortHelp: Ranged, Minor DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Power_Burst.help: You launch a very powerful burst of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back.
Power_Burst.shortHelp: Ranged (Close), High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Explosive_Blast.help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, causing all foes in caught in the blast to suffer energy and smashing damage. There is also a chance that affected foes will be knocked back.
Explosive_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Cybernetic_Blade.help: You slash your target with a cybernetic arm, causing lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Energy_Torrent.help: You unleash a powerful cone of energy in the direction of an enemy target. This energy blast causes smashing and energy damage to affected targets. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked back.
Energy_Torrent.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Bone_Smasher.help: You crush a single target with an energy infused overhead punch, causing smashing and energy damage. There is also a chance your target may be stunned.
Bone_Smasher.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Total_Focus.help: You strike a single target with an exceptionally powerful burst of energy. This causes the target and all those nearby to suffer smashing and energy damage. Affected targets are also stunned and may be taunted, preventing them from taking action against anyone but you.
Total_Focus.shortHelp: Melee (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy/Smashing), Stun (Foe), Chance to Taunt (Foe)
Total_Focus.targetHelp: You have been stunned and you may be taunted.
